    • Constructor Detail

      • NetGameModel

        public NetGameModel​(int canvasWidth,
                    int canvasHeight,
                    int imageWidth,
                    int imageHeight,
                    java.util.ArrayList<NormalFishCollect> imgs,
                    java.util.ArrayList<EnemyFishCollect> enemie,
                    java.util.ArrayList<TrashCollect> trashes,
                    Net net,
                    int score)
        Parameters:
        canvasWidth - width of the screen
        canvasHeight - height of the screen
        imageWidth - width of the net image
        imageHeight - height of the image
        imgs - arraylist of bass, the normal fish in the game, initialized in the view
        enemie - arraylist of enemy catfish, initialized in the view
        trashes - arraylist of trash objects, initialized in the view
        net - net object from the view
        score - score of the game

    • Method Detail

      • updateModeAndDirection

        public void updateModeAndDirection​(double x,
                                   double y,
                                   boolean paused)
        updates net location from the view in the model
        Parameters:
        x - x location of the net
        y - y location of the net
        paused - paused state of the game

      • updateLocationandDirection

        public void updateLocationandDirection​()
        checks the loation of all fish and trash objects against the net. If collision is detected, object is removed and a new one added at the start, score changing according to object type. if not collided, the object moves according to its velocity

      • getX

        public double getX​()
        returns x location of net
        Returns:
        xLoc

      • getY

        public double getY​()
        returns y location of net
        Returns:
        yLoc
